"Inkspiration" - An app that tracks your writing habits and provides personalized prompts to help you overcome writer's block.
"Fountain Pen Finder" - A website that allows users to search for fountain pens based on specific criteria such as price, ink color, and writing style.
"Fountain Pen" - A social media platform thats to connect fountain pen enthusiasts and allows them to share their writing experiences, tips, and tricks.
"Fountain Pen Pal" - A pen pal matching service that connects individuals with similar interests in fountain pens and writing.
"Fountain Pens" - A subscription service that delivers a new fountain pen and ink every month to help users explore different writing styles and techniques.
